text: The Kansas Sports Hall of Fame is a museum located in Wichita, Kansas. It is about preserving the history of sports in the state of Kansas. The museum has exhibits, archives, facilities, services, and activities to honor those people and teams whose achievements in sports brought fame to themselves, to their communities and to the entire state of Kansas. ==History== The Hall of Fame was founded in 1961 as part of the Kansas Centennial Celebration. Category:20th-century establishments in Kansas Category:1961 establishments in the United States Category:Sports halls of fame in the United States Category:Museums in the United States Category:Wichita, Kansas
title: Kansas Sports Hall of Fame
